endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all clients associated with the real estate agent's profile.
Add a new client to the real estate agent's database.
Update details of a specific client using their unique ID.
Remove a specified client from the database based on their unique ID.
Fetch a list of all available properties managed by the agent or agency.
Add a new property to the portfolio for sale or rent.
Edit information about a specific property identified by its unique ID.
Retrieve all scheduled appointments and meetings for the real estate agent.
Schedule a new appointment with a client or third party.
Cancel a scheduled appointment identified by its unique ID.
